text: I mean McConnell said right after the inauguration, It wasn't like they had the.
It was not like they had the wool pulled over their eyes or they got tricked.
This is in the middle of the economy basically collapsing like fucking Home Depot parking lots were war zones and he's all "ahr goal is to deny Obama a second term."
* So what in God's name would make any of these idiots think for a *second* that they would be helpful in constructing any kind of meaningful stimulus package.
